remarks: The values of a shifted function correspond to the value of the original function.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 24-Nov-2017.)
statement:
fargshift.g $e |- G = ( x e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` F ) ) |-> ( F ` ( x + 1 ) ) ) $.
fargshiftfva $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ F : ( 1 ... N ) --> dom E ) -> ( A. k e. ( 1 ... N ) ( E ` ( F ` k ) ) = [_ k / x ]_ P -> A. l e. ( 0 ..^ N ) ( E ` ( G ` l ) ) = [_ ( l + 1 ) / x ]_ P ) ) $.
$d E k l x $.
$d F k l x $.
$d G k $.
$d N k l x $.
$d P k l $.
